languages.text: "Действительно — даже примитивное побоище сделало бы этот фарс каплю интереснее".

traits.locale_text: "Действительно — даже примитивное побоище сделало бы этот фарс каплю интереснее".

languages.text: "Yes, even a primitive skirmish would have added a whit of animation to that farce."
languages.original_text: "Действительно — даже примитивное побоище сделало бы этот фарс каплю интереснее".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, even a primitive skirmish would have added a whit of animation to that farce."
"Yes, even a primitive skirmish would have added a whit of animation to that farce."
"Yes, even a primitive skirmish would have added a whit of animation to that farce."
"Yes, even a primitive skirmish would have added a whit of animation to that farce."
"Yes, even a primitive skirmish would have added a whit of animation to that farce."
"Yes, even a primitive skirmish would have added a whit of animation to that farce."

languages.text: 「そうだな。たとえ原始的な小競り合いでも、あの茶番にほんの少しは活気を与えてくれただろうに」
languages.original_text: "Yes, even a primitive skirmish would have added a whit of animation to that farce."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだな。たとえ原始的な小競り合いでも、あの茶番にほんの少しは活気を与えてくれただろうに」

languages.text: "Ja, selbst eine primitive Schlägerei hätte dieser Farce ein wenig Leben verliehen."
languages.original_text: "Yes, even a primitive skirmish would have added a whit of animation to that farce."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, selbst eine primitive Schlägerei hätte dieser Farce ein wenig Leben verliehen."

languages.text: « Oui, même un affrontement primitif aurait donné un peu de piment à cette mascarade. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, even a primitive skirmish would have added a whit of animation to that farce."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, même un affrontement primitif aurait donné un peu de piment à cette mascarade. »

languages.text: «Sí, incluso una escaramuza primitiva le habría añadido un poco de emoción a esa farsa».
languages.original_text: "Yes, even a primitive skirmish would have added a whit of animation to that farce."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, incluso una escaramuza primitiva le habría añadido un poco de emoción a esa farsa».

languages.text: “没错，即便是一场野蛮、原始的杀戮，也能为这场闹剧增添一丝趣味。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, even a primitive skirmish would have added a whit of animation to that farce."

traits.locale_text: “没错，即便是一场野蛮、原始的杀戮，也能为这场闹剧增添一丝趣味。”

languages.text: "Evet. En ufak bir tantana bile o rezilliğe az da olsa neşe katardı."
languages.original_text: "Yes, even a primitive skirmish would have added a whit of animation to that farce."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. En ufak bir tantana bile o rezilliğe az da olsa neşe katardı."

languages.original_text: "Yes, even a primitive skirmish would have added a whit of animation to that farce."
